mainText:
To Steve's family, 
You are in my prayers as you grieve the loss of your husband and father. Steve forever changed my view of the world, when I heard about the struggles he went through in life and how he didn't let that affect his dreams and vision it encouraged me to not let my own dreams die just because life throws me a few curve balls. I will always be able grateful to Steve for more than his products, I'll be grateful for his life. God Bless!
author: Luis
